mapper.select: SELECT bo.boNo, bo.boTitle, bo.email, m.nickname, m.profileImg, bo.boContent, bo.boHit, bo.boRecommend, bo.boRegDate, bo.boModDate, c.cateNm FROM board bo LEFT JOIN boardcategory c ON bo.cateNo = c.cateNo LEFT JOIN member m ON bo.email = m.email WHERE bo.boNo = #{boNo} AND bo.boDelYn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( boNo, boTitle, email, boContent, BOHIT, BORECOMMEND, BOCOMMENT, BOREGDATE, BODELYN, CATENO, ISNOTICE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(boNo), 0) + 1 FROM BOARD), #{boTitle}, #{email}, #{boContent}, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE, 'N', #{cateNo}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET boContent = #{boContent}, boModDate = SYSDATE WHERE boNo = #{boNo} AND boDelYn = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likeboard (boNo, email, likeRegDate) VALUES (#{boNo}, #{email}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likeboard WHERE boNo = #{boNo} AND email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE boNo < #{boNo} AND boDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY boNo DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE boNo > #{boNo} AND boDelYn = 'N' ORDER BY boNo ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM comment WHERE boNo = #{boNo} ORDER BY comment_date ASC
